weapons.name: Excalibur
weapons.info: this excalibur is a duplicate of King Arthur's. I made the Masters of Blacksmiths from heaven forge a million copies and sell them here, on this lower realm for quadruple the price.

weapons.name: Peacekeeper
weapons.info: Peacekeeper is the sword of the soldiers of the southern continent of heaven who i one-sidedly obliterated into oblivion to preserve the peace i arduously constructed for 2 million years. though i go by the title 'Heavenly Merchant', the adjective 'Heavenly' isn't just there for the sake of decoration.

weapons.name: Devide and Conquer, Betrayers of Blessings
weapons.info: This weapon is forged personally by me. i used the Fangs of a 500,000-year-old Divine Mithril Serpent, and the claws of a newborn Earthen Dragon, and also the the core of an 8th-circled Arch-Wizard who specialized in Earth Magic.

weapons.name: Decimation, Slayer of the Empty Void
weapons.info:
This sword is the materialization of iniquity, immorality, evil, cruelty and atrocity of all the people who are living on the upper realm.

Once every 1 million years, this sword creates its own wielder, the immortals called 'The Demon King' and everytime, ever since i existed, i have killed this Demon King for as many times a mortal can count to the end of his/her life span.

I have existed since before the time created itself. the amount of Demon King corpse that i have in my inventory is enough to fill the concept of void. So i forged an unending amount of copies of the sword 'Decimation, Slayer of the Empty Void'.

weapons.name: Thunderstorm Carver
weapons.info: Everytime i fart i am always accidentally destroying approximately 69 dimension. So i programmed my butt to forge 'Thunderstorm Carver' everytime i fart.
